trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar" /> adapter class for the cHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 为 cHTML 适配器集提供 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar" /> 适配器类。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The cHTML calendar adapter uses secondary user interface (UI) facilities to display a calendar control across multiple pages.
trans-unit.target: CHTML 日历适配器使用辅助用户界面 (UI) 功能来跨多页显示一个日历控件。

trans-unit.source: For operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用于在托管环境中操作。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />；权限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlCalendarAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlCalendarAdapter" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Name of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the event was handled.
trans-unit.target: 如果已处理事件，则返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.target: 如果已处理事件，则 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current view state.

trans-unit.target: 一个包含事件数据的对象（由 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 定义）。

trans-unit.source: Loads data that pertains to a control, a page, or a device adapter.
trans-unit.target: 加载与控件、页面或设备适配器相关的数据。

trans-unit.source: Called by the control's OnPreRender method, to perform adapter-specific work prior to rendering.
trans-unit.target: 由该控件的 OnPreRender 方法调用，用于在呈现前执行适配器特定的工作。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: The text writer to receive output.
trans-unit.target: 用于接收输出的文本编写器。

trans-unit.source: Generates the target-specific markup for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 生成关联控件的特定于目标的标记。

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the adapter generates markup that requires <see langword="<Form>" /> tags for form submission.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示适配器是否生成提交表单时需要 <see langword="<Form>" /> 标记的标记。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the adapter generates markup that requires **<Form>** tags for form submission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果适配器生成需要的标记**<窗体>**标记的窗体提交; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the control saves its private view state.
trans-unit.target: 当控件保存其私有视图状态时调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Null" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="Null" />。
